Install tricky R packages

Source: R/extra_installs.R
extra_installs.Rd

Some of echolocatoR's optional R package dependencies are especially tricky to install. Rather than including them in the DESCRIPTION file, which would require them to install echolocatoR at all, this functions installs them afterwards. Only packages not already installed will be installed.

extra_installs(
  cran_packages = F,
  xgr = T,
  bioc_packages = T,
  github_packages = T
)

Details

Some of the main packages installed via this function include:

gaston

CRAN

plotly

CRAN

XGR

xgr

foreign

xgr

refGenome

xgr

Rgraphviz

Bioconductor

biomaRt

Bioconductor

knitrBootstrap

GitHub

susieR

GitHub

Examples

library(echolocatoR)
extra_installs()
